00043 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00044 /// CTreeTraceView
00045 ///
00046 /// @description  This class allows the user to view the trace of a tree. It is
00047 ///               based on the QTableWidget which it uses for all of the display
00048 ///               and drawing functionality.
00049 ///
00050 /// @limitations  The QTableWidget allows for minimal customization in how the
00051 ///               grid is drawn. Row and Column headers and the fonts can be
00052 ///               changed as well as the cell contents. It cannot change the
00053 ///               thickness or color of individual lines, nor can it display any
00054 ///               not within a cell.
00055 ///
00056 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00057 class CPuzzleTraceView : public QTableWidget
00058 {
00059     Q_OBJECT
00060 
00061 public:
00062     CPuzzleTraceView( QWidget *parent );
00063     ~CPuzzleTraceView();
00064 
00065     QSpinBox *getDepthSelector();
00066     //QSpinBox *getQSDepthSelector();
00067     QMenu *getAIConfigMenu();
00068     QToolButton * getAIConfigButton();
00069     QComboBox *getAISelector();
00070     QComboBox *getTreeGraphSelector();
00071     QLabel *getAILabel();
00072 
00073 
00074     void setGraphModel( CPuzzleGraphModel *model );
00075 
00076     QList<QStringList> gridFromCall( SPuzzleCall *call );
00077     QList<QStringList> gridFromTrace( SPuzzleTrace *trace );
00078 
00079  void signalRepaint(void) { retrace(); }
00080

00082     void retrace();
